readable.title: 2833820456_143ea6ce47
readable.content: A girl about to eat watermelon and drink juice . a little girl is sitting at a table with a jug of juice and some watermelon slices . A little girl sits at a table outdoors and eats watermelon . A young girl at a card table selling lemonade and watermelon . Young girl sitting at a table selling lemonade and watermelon slices .
